title: Allhallow's Eve
description: 'If you've missed Laymon, you've missed a treat' Stephen KingThe Sherwood house has been deserted since the horrific killing of a local family in the sleepy town of Ashburg. When invitations to a mysterious party to be held there are sent out, nobody is particularly surprised - after all, everyone wants to party in a house of death on Allhallow's Eve.
author: Richard Laymon
